typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		messageId as string,
		deviceId as string,
		temperature as double,
		humidity as double,
		EventProcessedUtcTime as string,
		PartitionId as string,
		EventEnqueuedUtcTime as string,
		IoTHub as (MessageId as string, CorrelationId as string, ConnectionDeviceId as string, ConnectionDeviceGenerationId as string, EnqueuedTime as string)
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	limit: 100,
	documentForm: 'documentPerLine') ~> source1
source1 split(temperature > 25,
	disjoint: true) ~> TempSplit@(tempHigh, tempLow)
TempSplit@tempHigh sink(input(
		messageId as integer,
		devideId as string,
		temperature as integer,
		humidity as integer,
		EventProcessedTime as string,
		PartitionId as integer,
		EventEnqueuedUtcTime as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		messageId,
		devideId = deviceId,
		temperature,
		humidity,
		EventProcessedTime = EventProcessedUtcTime,
		PartitionId,
		EventEnqueuedUtcTime
	),
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink1
TempSplit@tempLow sink(skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink2
